Class IntAssertion

  • Object
    • IntAssertion

  • public class IntAssertion
extends Object
    Represents an assertion about an integer.
    Author:
    ejewart

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IntAssertion(int subject, String... subjectDescArg) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IntAssertion comparesTo(NumericCompareType compareType, int other, String... otherDescArg)
      Verify that subject int is in the specified comparison relationship with another int.
      IntAssertion equals(int other)
      Deprecated. 
      use isEqualTo instead
      IntAssertion isBetween(int otherLow, int otherHigh, String... otherDescArg)
      Verify that subject int value is between two other int values (inclusive)
      IntAssertion isEqualTo(int other, String... otherDescArg)
      Verifies that this is exactly equal to the specified other value
      IntAssertion isNotEqualTo(int other, String... otherDescArg)
      Verifies that an integer is not equal to the specified other value.

    • Method Detail

      • comparesTo

        public IntAssertion comparesTo(NumericCompareType compareType,
                               int other,
                               String... otherDescArg)
        Verify that subject int is in the specified comparison relationship with another int.
        Parameters:
        compareType - one of the enum values in NumericCompareType
        other - the int value to compare the subject value with
        otherDescArg - optional description of the other int
        Returns:
        this if comparison relationship holds
        Throws:
        AssertionError - if the comparison does not hold

      • isEqualTo

        public IntAssertion isEqualTo(int other,
                              String... otherDescArg)
        Verifies that this is exactly equal to the specified other value
        Parameters:
        other - value to compare subject to
        otherDescArg - optional description of other value
        Returns:
        this if value is equal to other value
        Throws:
        AssertionError - if value is not equal to other value

      • isNotEqualTo

        public IntAssertion isNotEqualTo(int other,
                                 String... otherDescArg)
        Verifies that an integer is not equal to the specified other value.
        Parameters:
        other - value to compare subject value to
        otherDescArg - optional description of other value
        Returns:
        this if value is not equal to other value
        Throws:
        AssertionError - if value is equal to other value

      • equals

        @Deprecated
public IntAssertion equals(int other)
        Deprecated. use isEqualTo instead
        verify whether the int equals an expected value
        Parameters:
        other - value to compare subject to
        Returns:
        this if value is equal to other value
        Throws:
        AssertionError - if value is not equal to other value

      • isBetween

        public IntAssertion isBetween(int otherLow,
                              int otherHigh,
                              String... otherDescArg)
        Verify that subject int value is between two other int values (inclusive)
        Parameters:
        otherLow - value that subject must be equal to or greater than
        otherHigh - value that subject must be less than or equal to
        otherDescArg - optional description of the other int value
        Returns:
        this if value is between other two values
        Throws:
        AssertionError - if value is not between other two values
        IllegalArgumentException - if otehr low is greater than other high
